title: ‘Tour de France Preparations Have Begun’: Jonas Vingegaard in Race Against Time After Injury Layoff
content:
After crashing out of Paris-Nice with a concussion, Vingegaard says he's fully recovered and focused on a Tadej Pogačar rematch: 'Leaving nothing to chance.'

Read the full article at ‘Tour de France Preparations Have Begun’: Jonas Vingegaard in Race Against Time After Injury Layoff on Velo.
author: ahood
